options.name: Unsend Emails
options.command: {% if groupReceiver %}group {{groupReceiver}} delete messages query rfc822msgid:{{messageId}} max_to_delete 100 doit{% elif receiver %}user {{receiver}} delete messages query rfc822msgid:{{messageId}} doit{% else %}print 'Error: Either Group Receiver or Receiver Email Address is required.'{% endif %}

options.name: Show Forwarding Address
options.command: user {{userEmail}} show forwardingaddress

options.name: Add Forwarding Address
options.command: user {{userEmail}} add forwardingaddress {{forwardingEmail}}

options.name: Set Forwarding Address
options.command: user {{userEmail}} forward on keep {{forwardToEmail}}

options.name: Delete Forwarding Address
options.command: user {{userEmail}} delete forwardingaddress {{forwardToEmail}}

options.name: Show Email Filter (for Multi Users Forwarding)
options.command: user {{userEmail}} show filter

options.name: Create Email Filter (for Multi Users Forwarding)
options.command: user {{userEmail}} add filter to {{userEmail}} forward {{forwardToEmail}}

options.name: Delete Email Filter (for Multi Users Forwarding)
options.command: user {{userEmail}} delete filters {{filterID}}

options.name: Show Email Delegates
options.command: user {{userEmail}} print delegates

options.name: Remove Email Delegate
options.command: user {{userEmail}} delete delegate {{delegatedEmail}}

options.name: Delegate Access
options.command: user {{userEmail}} delegate to {{delegatingEmail}}

options.name: Create Classes
options.command: csv gsheet fung@hamlin.org 1nmSNCJ9Liw0H3JtoUIA7Vu2_HCfmBaezGePa5MugZqk newcourses gam create course alias '~name' teacher '~teacher' name '~name'

options.name: Activate Classes
options.command: csv gsheet fung@hamlin.org 1nmSNCJ9Liw0H3JtoUIA7Vu2_HCfmBaezGePa5MugZqk activatecourses gam update course '~id' status ACTIVE

options.name: Add Students
options.command: csv gsheet fung@hamlin.org 1nmSNCJ9Liw0H3JtoUIA7Vu2_HCfmBaezGePa5MugZqk addstudents gam course '~id' add student '~email'

options.name: Add Teachers
options.command: csv gsheet fung@hamlin.org 1nmSNCJ9Liw0H3JtoUIA7Vu2_HCfmBaezGePa5MugZqk addteachers gam course '~id' add teacher '~email'

options.name: Invite Guardians
options.command: csv gsheet fung@hamlin.org 1nmSNCJ9Liw0H3JtoUIA7Vu2_HCfmBaezGePa5MugZqk guardians gam user '~studentemail' add guardian '~guardianemail'

options.name: Delete Guardians
options.command: csv gsheet fung@hamlin.org 1nmSNCJ9Liw0H3JtoUIA7Vu2_HCfmBaezGePa5MugZqk guardians gam user '~studentemail' delete guardian '~guardianemail'

options.name: Archive Classes
options.command: csv gsheet fung@hamlin.org 1nmSNCJ9Liw0H3JtoUIA7Vu2_HCfmBaezGePa5MugZqk archive-delete gam update course '~id-archive' state archived

options.name: Delete Classes
options.command: csv gsheet fung@hamlin.org 1nmSNCJ9Liw0H3JtoUIA7Vu2_HCfmBaezGePa5MugZqk archive-delete gam delete course '~id-delete'

options.name: Change Class Name
options.command: csv gsheet fung@hamlin.org 1nmSNCJ9Liw0H3JtoUIA7Vu2_HCfmBaezGePa5MugZqk classid gam update course '~id' name '~name'

options.name: Delete Students
options.command: csv gsheet fung@hamlin.org 1nmSNCJ9Liw0H3JtoUIA7Vu2_HCfmBaezGePa5MugZqk deletestudents gam course '~id' delete student '~email'

options.name: Check a Class ID
options.command: print classes | awk -F',' '/{className}/ {print $1}'

options.name: Print All Active Classes
options.command: print courses state active todrive

options.name: Add File Editor
options.command: user {{owner_email_address}} add drivefileacl {{file_ID}} user {{editor_email_address}} role writer
